document_data.name: ''Waiting Grave''
document_data.author: [[Dezsmra Langrafarl]]
document_data.History: The ballad sang about heroes and treacherous villains. The ''Waiting Grave'' was recored in a collection of ballads by Dezsmra Langrafarl – ''[[A Minstrel's Whimsy‎]]'', a [[chapbook]] published in the {{YearlinkName|1382}}.
